Text:
Many thanks, raymond_u, you were quick off the mark this week!

Does anyone else find the cover causes an error with Acrobat (it's fine with all the other readers like Nitro, Nuance, Sumatra, etc)?
Cheers thorhammer. I don't use Acrobat (I use the built in PDF viewer my Mac has) so I can't really comment on that.

@thorhammer, yeah I get the error on the cover too . . using adobe pdf reader. First time, in recent memory at least.
 Thanks too raymond_u .

GR8 UP
TankX


Demoniod we will surely miss you RIP
